message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Constructive session for mid/small caps with leadership in PSU/defense (BHEL, BEL, HINDCOPPER), exchanges/depositories (BSE, CDSL) and select pharma. NBFCs (LTF) saw intraday shakeout to 291.65 before recovering to 295.05—risk remains due to our outsized LTF weight. Focus: manage LTF risk, buy strength in metals/exchange theme on defined triggers.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Trim/Trail", "reason": "Wide intraday range (302.45→291.65) and close below 300 with heavy volume; reduce concentration and trail with tight stop.", "price": 295.05},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Add on retest/breakout", "reason": "Held 2610–2635 demand; buy dips to 2620–2635 or breakout above 2665–2670 with volume. Theme strength pairs with CDSL.", "price": 2644.20},
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Add on strength", "reason": "Closed near highs; momentum continuation if it clears 430–432. Keep risk tight given prior range.", "price": 427.30},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "signal": "Add on breakout", "reason": "Strong close near day high; continuation trigger above 287.8–288.5. PSU/defense bid remains firm.", "price": 285.80},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Buy on retest", "reason": "Breakout holds; prefer entries 1565–1585 on dip or small starter at 1590–1600 with clear stop.", "price": 1600.90},
    {"symbol": "SAIL", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Constructive coil; buy through 145.2–145.3 for momentum or buy dip to 141–142 with defined stop.", "price": 144.40},
    {"symbol": "INDUSTOWER", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Tight base under 405; buy strength above 404.9–405.5 with stop around 392.", "price": 400.60},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Buy-the-dip only", "reason": "Extended after big push; look for pullbacks to 346–351 with stop near 333.", "price": 359.70},
    {"symbol": "LAURUSLABS", "signal": "Hold/Trail", "reason": "Momentum intact though it faded off 1005; trail stop near 964; add only on fresh strength >1005.", "price": 985.70},
    {"symbol": "ABCAPITAL", "signal": "Buy on retest", "reason": "Reclaimed 325–330; prefer pullback entries 325–330 with stop ~324 to keep RR favorable.", "price": 329.35}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "LTF", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Risk management—position ~43% of portfolio; trim into strength or exit partial on breakdown.", "quantity": 12, "price": "If bounce: sell MKT 299–301; If weak: SL-M 289.00"},
    {"symbol": "SAIL", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Momentum entry on breakout; diversify away from single-name NBFC risk.", "quantity": 10, "price": "Trigger 145.30; LMT 146.50; initial SL 137.50"},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "action": "Buy", "reason": "Pair trade with BSE within strong exchange/depository theme; staggered entry on dip.", "quantity": 1, "price": "LMT 1,588.00 (prefer 1,565–1,585); SL 1,495"}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 472.60,
    "total_value": 27463.60,
    "holdings_count": 6,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 @ ₹2385.00 (CMP ₹2644.20)",
      "LTF: 40 @ ₹275.59 (CMP ₹295.05)",
      "BEL: 10 @ ₹419.45 (CMP ₹427.30)",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 @ ₹900.05 (CMP ₹985.70)",
      "BHEL: 10 @ ₹265.49 (CMP ₹285.80)",
      "NHPC: 30 @ ₹81.48 (CMP ₹81.89)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Defense/PSU bid: BHEL, BEL strong; HINDCOPPER extended—favor dips rather than chase.",
    "Exchanges/depositories: BSE constructive at 2620–2650; CDSL breakout holding; MCX extended—avoid fresh buys.",
    "Pharma mixed: LAURUS holds uptrend; ALKEM firm; EMCURE weak—avoid until it reclaims 1400.",
    "Banks/NBFCs: LTF volatile—use 289–291 as line-in-sand for partial; AUBANK soft; PSU banks mixed (UNIONBANK steady, IOB/UCO flat).",
    "Telecom towers: INDUSTOWER basing—trigger above 405 could open next leg.",
    "Metals: SAIL near breakout, HINDCOPPER strong; manage entries with tight stops given late-stage risk.",
    "IT/ER&D: KPITTECH strong >1210; COFORGE/MPHASIS stable—no urgency for new buys in small portfolio.",
    "Staples/Discretionary: JUBLFOOD needs >589 for cleaner momentum; MARICO/DABUR range-bound.",
    "Utilities/Renewables: NTPCGREEN range-bound near 98; NHPC inside range 79.5–83—continue hold.",
    "Risk controls (current holdings): LTF trail 289.0; BSE 2575; BEL 414; BHEL 275; LAURUS 964; NHPC 79.9.",
    "Execution note: If market gaps >0.7%, let 20–30 minutes set intraday range; prefer pullback entries over chasing."
  ]
}
